98852.<pc>は 突然のめまいに おそわれ\n意識が 遠のいていった……。:
<pc> was suddenly overcome by
dizziness and lost consciousness.

98854.<pc>のもとに\n光に包まれた巻物が 降りてきた。:
A scroll wrapped in light descended down in
front of <pc>.

98856.<cs_pchero>は 突然のめまいに おそわれ\n意識が 遠のいていった……:
<cs_pchero> was suddenly overcome by
dizziness and lost consciousness...

98857.「刻印は すべて 刻まれた……。\n さあ……。私のもとへ来るのだ……。:
All marks have been engraved...
Now... come to me...

98858.「また 刻印が……。\n 大丈夫なのか <cs_pchero>？:
Another mark....
Are you all right, <cs_pchero>?

98862.「いけにえの羊よ……。\n 我らが主…… 破壊と殺りくの神……\n ダークドレア:
The sacrifice of our great Lord, the god of
death and destruction, Nokturnus... You must
come to him now...

98863.「まずい！ また あいつらか？: Oh, no! Is it them again?

98864.「いけにえの羊よ……。\n 何者も 逃れることは かなわない。\n ダークドレア:
Sacrificial lambs, nothing can escape us. Come
to Master Nokturnus.

98865.「大丈夫だったか <cs_pchero>？\n あいつらは いったい なんなんだ: Are you okay? Who in the world were they?!

98866.「やはり キミに刻まれた刻印と\n 何か 関係があるのか？:
I wonder if it has to do with the marking
engraved on you...?

98867.「いけにえの羊よ……。\n 我々は 貴様を 我が主のもとへ\n 連れていくまで:
Pitiful sacrifice... we shall pursue you
without end until we bring you to our Lord...

98868.「キミが戦っている間に 解読は終わらせた。\n 呪われたものを浄化する この古代:
While you were fighting, I finished deciphering this. This ancient spell can purify the cursed, and should be able to expel
your mark.

98869.「不浄なるものよ……。\n この世に けがれをもたらすものよ……。:
You who are impure, and bear a stain upon
this world...

98870.「我が言葉を聞き 鎮まりたまえ。\n 破邪の光にて 消え去りたまえ……。:
Hear and be appeased by my words. By this
sacred light, it shall be extinguished...

98872.「……本来なら この呪文は\n 膨大な魔力を消費しなければ\n 唱えることの で:
Normally, this spell can only be cast at the
expense of a great deal of magical power...

98873.「だが この巻物には あらかじめ\n 魔力が 込められていたようだ。\n おかげ:
But, it seems that the scroll had enough power
inside of it from the get go. It worked out
quite well.

98874.「刻印だけじゃなく それによって現れた\n 魔物どもも 消し去ってしまったからな:
Not only did it destroy the mark, it destroyed
those other monsters, too. It's simply an
amazing power, don't you think?

98875.「……この古代呪文の名は シャナク。\n これこそ ボクの求めていたものだ。\n:
The name of that spell is Sheen. It's exactly
what I was looking for. I must really thank
you, <cs_pchero>.

98876.<center>……私の刻印から\n逃れる者がいようとはな。:
...It seems that there is one who has escaped
my mark....

98877.<center>だが 刻印を刻まれし者は\nお前だけではないと 知るがいい。\n:
But, know this. You are not the only one who
has been engraved. In time, another sacrifice
shall take your place...

98878.「……刻印は 消すことができたが\n キミには まだ やらなきゃならないことが\:
Even though I removed the mark, it seems like
you still have work to do.

98879.「ボクは シャナクの完全な会得を目指そう。\n 巻物は なくなってしまったが 必:
I'm going to practice perfecting Sheen. The
scroll may be gone, but this spell is one
that I want to make my own.

98880.「キミは 夢占い師のもとへ 戻ったほうがいい。\n 刻印が消えたことを しらせる:
You should go back to that fortune teller and
let her know that your mark is gone.

98881.「お久しぶり……と言って いいものか\n 迷うところですが どうしても\n あな:
It's been a long time... well, maybe I
shouldn't say that. But, I really wanted to
see you again, so I came here.

98882.「私が果たせなかった使命……。\n 私の身体を受け継いだ あなたに\n 託したこ:
That mission that I had failed... do you
remember? I entrusted it to you once you
became the owner of my body.

98883.「エルフの失われし呪文を 身につけ\n 滅びの運命にある 緑の大地を救うこと。\:
To save the green land from perdition by
wearing the lost spell of the Elf. That was my
mission.

98884.「あのシャナクの呪文こそ\n その 失われし呪文の ひとつなのです。: That spell Sheen is one of those lost spells.

98885.「唱えたのが アサナギだったことには\n 少しだけ おどろきましたが 彼もまた\:
I really was surprised that it was Asanagi who
ended up using that spell... but I know he
also strived for the same thing I did.

98886.「その努力が実ったのも あなたが\n シャナクの呪文を 見つけてくれたおかげ。\:
None of this wouldn't have been possible
without your help in your discovery of that
spell. I wanted to thank you.

98887.「まだ ひとつだけとはいえ あの呪文は\n エルフの未来を救う 足がかりとなるは:
Even though it's just one spell now, it surely
will be a stepping stone in saving the future
of the Elves. Thank you so much.

98888.「……私は ずっと 悩んでいました。\n 私の果たすべき使命を あなたに\n 押:
It's something I've struggled with for some
time now... that I imposed such an important
mission on you.

98889.「あなたには あなたの やらなければ\n ならないことが たくさん ある。\n:
You have many things that you need to take
care of, and I think I may have gotten in the
way of that.

98890.「……アサナギとは 学びの庭で\n 日々を同じく過ごす よき学友であり\n お互:
Asanagi and I spent our days together in the
garden of learning, and we were good friends
and rivals who helped each other improve.

98891.「アサナギは 今後も 努力を続けるでしょう。\n 彼にならば 私も安心して\n:
Asanagi will continue to work hard. I feel
confident that I can entrust the future of
the elves to him.

98892.「ですから どうか これからは\n あなた自身のために あなたのすべきことを\n:
So please, from now on, do what you have to do
for yourself.

98893.「それが 私の あなたに対する\n 新しい願いです。: That is my new wish for you.

98894.「……どうやら 時間のようです。\n 私は 行かねばなりません。: ...it seems like it's time. I have to go.

98895.「さようなら エテーネの村の<pc>……。\n どうか お元気で……。:
Goodbye <pc> of Ethene Village...
please take care...

98896.「エルフの失われし呪文を 身につけ\n 滅びの運命にある 緑の大地を救うこと。\:
To save the green land from destruction by
learning the lost spell of the Elf. That was
my mission.

98897.「あのシャナクの呪文こそ\n その 失われし呪文の ひとつなのです。: That spell Sheen is one of those lost spells.

98898.「唱えたのが アサナギだったことには\n 少々 おどろかされましたけど 彼もまた:
I was somewhat surprised to learn that it was
Asanagi who chanted the words, but he, too,
was striving to protect the green earth.

98899.「その努力が実ったのも あなたが\n シャナクの呪文を 見つけてくれたおかげ。\:
All of these efforts were made possible by
your discovery of the Shanach spell. I would
like to thank you.

98900.「まだ ひとつだけとはいえ あの呪文は\n エルフの未来を救う 足がかりとなるは:
Even though it's just one spell now, it surely
will be a stepping stone in saving the future
of the Elves. Thank you so much.

98901.「……私は ずっと 悩んでいました。\n 私の果たすべき使命を あなたに\n 押:
It's something I've struggled with for some
time now... that I imposed such an important
mission on you.

98902.「あなたには あなたの やらなければ\n ならないことが たくさん ある。\n:
You have many things that you need to take
care of, and I think I may have gotten in the
way of that.

98903.「……アサナギとは 学びの庭で\n 日々を同じく過ごす よき学友であり\n お互:
Asanagi and I spent our days together in the
Garden of Learning, where we were good friends
and even good rivals, too.

98904.「アサナギは これからも 精進を続けますわ。\n 彼にならば 私も安心して\n:
I know Asanagi will continue to devote himself
to his work. I have peace of mind knowing that
I can trust him with the Elves' future.

98905.「ですから どうか これからは\n あなた自身のために あなたのすべきことを\n:
So, please... from now on, do what you must do
for yourself.

98906.「それが 私の あなたに対する\n 新しい願いですわ。: That is my new request to you.

98907.「……どうやら 時間のようですわね。\n そろそろ 失礼しないと……。:
Well, it looks like it's time. Then, if you'll
excuse me...

98908.「さようなら エテーネの村の<pc>……。\n どうか お元気でいてくださいまし:
Goodbye, <pc> of Ethene
Village... Please take care of yourself...

98911.「お久しぶりですね……と言って いいものか\n 迷うところですが どうしても\n:
I'm not sure if I should say "It's been a
while"... but I really wanted to see you, so I
came here.

98912.「私が果たせなかった使命……。\n 私の身体を受け継いだ あなたに\n 託したこ:
That mission I failed to fulfill, do you
remember what it was? I entrusted it to you
once you took over my body.

100175.「これは 私からのお礼です。\n いつか きっと 何かの役に立つでしょう。\n:
This is my way of saying thank you. I am sure
it will be of some use to you one day. Please
accept it.

100177.「これは 私からのお礼です。\n いつか きっと 何かの役に立つでしょう。\n:
This is my way of saying thank you. I am sure
it will be of some use to you one day. Please
accept it.

106450.「おい どうしたっていうんだ？\n しっかりしろ！！: Hey, are you all right? Pull it together!

106451.<center>そのとき 私は 夢より出でて\nお前たちの世界を この手にするの:
Then, I shall ascend from this dream to take
your world within my grasp, and return all
into nothingness...
